title: Ni1mo
author: Ni1mo
content: CREATE CONTENT PLAN | AUTOMATIZE  PROCESSES INTRODUCING TARGET TRAFFIC BOOST GROUP TO THE TOP OF SEARCH TRANSFERRING YOUR PROJECT FROM OTHER SOCIAL NETWORKS / SITES / FORUMS - TO TELEGRAMOLD GROUPS & CHANNELSBOTS | SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENTTRUST ACCOUNTS | BOTS CREATIVE | DESIGN LONG TIME INVITE | MASS DMOUR MANAGERS IN TELEGRAM@tele_SOS@Franceska_Telegio@beermom​

comments.author: Ni1mo
comments.body: Gentlemens, changed the approach to the invite because of updates Telegram. Now there are only 2 options and they all start with 01. Set project - group / account trust / our server / bots / 2000 invites ( maximum )2. Put the project - a group / account trust / our server / bots + Invite to the long to 200 000 ( maximum)So project for 2 days with 2000 peoples ( invite ) - for 2 days, or on the long - term invite per 100 - 200 invite in 1 day

comments.author: Ni1mo
comments.body: Current prices for popular services Invite SHORT - 1-3k at a time. 60$ for 1000 Invite LONG - $ 100 for 1000 What is an Invite to the Long - 300 accounts come in and 50 random accounts a day will do on 1 invite On neural networks count rises to 200 invites per dayDM - $70 per 1000 SPAM on chats - $35 for 100 Account for personal use - 10$ (server GB - 6+ months old)
